Serious symptoms Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing Chest pain or pressure Loss of speeach or movement Cough High Fever

Please login to your account You have succeful created an account Please log in Log out Self Before you continue We need to know a few things about you before you can start submitting your self assessments. If you already used this application and register, please Log in. If you have never registered please register. How this Self assessment tool works This tool can help you understand what to do nest about Covid-19. It helps you to keep daily logs of your health. You will be required to answer a few questions about symptoms, travel, contact and your general health. All your answers are store locally until you chose to Share them with the ministry Assessment History No Self assessments available Take your daily self test Take your daily self test.
